title: 322.14 RELATION OF LIMITED PARTNERS INTER SE.
text: Where there are several limited partners the members may agree that one or more of the limited partners shall have a priority over other limited partners as to the return of their contributions, as to their compensation by way of income, or as to any other matter. If such an agreement is made it shall be stated in the certificate and, in the absence of such a statement, all the limited partners shall stand upon equal footing.
